languages.text: "Ты! Ты забирал нас из пекла! Ты сулил награду! Ты..." {n}Лицо искажается в гримасе — и губы существа слипаются, словно расплавленный воск.{/n}
"You! You took us from the inferno! You promised us a reward! You..." {n}Her face contorts in a grimace, and the creature's lips stick together like melted wax.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Ты! Ты забирал нас из пекла! Ты сулил награду! Ты..." {n}Лицо искажается в гримасе — и губы существа слипаются, словно расплавленный воск.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "You! You took us from the inferno! You promised us a reward! You..." {n}Her face contorts in a grimace, and the creature's lips stick together like melted wax.{/n}
"You! You took us from the inferno! You promised us a reward! You..." {n}Her face contorts in a grimace, and the creature's lips stick together like melted wax.{/n}
"You! You took us from the inferno! You promised us a reward! You..." {n}Her face contorts in a grimace, and the creature's lips stick together like melted wax.{/n}
"You! You took us from the inferno! You promised us a reward! You..." {n}Her face contorts in a grimace, and the creature's lips stick together like melted wax.{/n}

languages.text: “你！你带着我们离开了炼狱！你答应会奖励我们！你……”{n}她的脸逐渐变得扭曲、狰狞，嘴唇像融化的蜡一样粘在了一起。{/n}
languages.original_text: "You! You took us from the inferno! You promised us a reward! You..." {n}Her face contorts in a grimace, and the creature's lips stick together like melted wax.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “你！你带着我们离开了炼狱！你答应会奖励我们！你……”{n}她的脸逐渐变得扭曲、狰狞，嘴唇像融化的蜡一样粘在了一起。{/n}

languages.text: «¡Tú! ¡Nos arrancaste del infierno! ¡Nos prometiste una recompensa! Tú...». {n}Su cara hace una mueca y los labios de la criatura se funden como si fueran de cera derretida.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You! You took us from the inferno! You promised us a reward! You..." {n}Her face contorts in a grimace, and the creature's lips stick together like melted wax.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «¡Tú! ¡Nos arrancaste del infierno! ¡Nos prometiste una recompensa! Tú...». {n}Su cara hace una mueca y los labios de la criatura se funden como si fueran de cera derretida.{/n}

languages.text: 「あなた！あなたが私達を地獄から救い出した！報酬を約束した！あなたが…」{n}彼女の顔は険しく歪んでおり、その生物の唇は溶けた蝋のようにくっついていた。{/n}
languages.original_text: "You! You took us from the inferno! You promised us a reward! You..." {n}Her face contorts in a grimace, and the creature's lips stick together like melted wax.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「あなた！あなたが私達を地獄から救い出した！報酬を約束した！あなたが…」{n}彼女の顔は険しく歪んでおり、その生物の唇は溶けた蝋のようにくっついていた。{/n}

languages.text: "Ihr! Ihr habt uns aus dem Inferno geholt! Ihr habt uns eine Belohnung versprochen! Ihr ..." {n}Ihr Gesicht verzerrt sich zu einer Grimasse, und die Lippen der Kreatur kleben zusammen wie geschmolzenes Wachs.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You! You took us from the inferno! You promised us a reward! You..." {n}Her face contorts in a grimace, and the creature's lips stick together like melted wax.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ihr! Ihr habt uns aus dem Inferno geholt! Ihr habt uns eine Belohnung versprochen! Ihr ..." {n}Ihr Gesicht verzerrt sich zu einer Grimasse, und die Lippen der Kreatur kleben zusammen wie geschmolzenes Wachs.{/n}

languages.text: « Vous ! Vous nous avez sortis de la fournaise ! Vous nous avez promis une récompense ! Vous... » {n}Une grimace lui déforme le visage, et ses lèvres se collent l'une à l'autre comme de la cire fondue.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You! You took us from the inferno! You promised us a reward! You..." {n}Her face contorts in a grimace, and the creature's lips stick together like melted wax.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Vous ! Vous nous avez sortis de la fournaise ! Vous nous avez promis une récompense ! Vous... » {n}Une grimace lui déforme le visage, et ses lèvres se collent l'une à l'autre comme de la cire fondue.{/n}

languages.text: "Siz! Bizi albızlardan aldınız! Ödüllendirecektiniz! Siz..." {n}Yaratığın yüzü buruşuyor, dudaklarıysa erimiş bal mumu gibi birbirine yapışıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You! You took us from the inferno! You promised us a reward! You..." {n}Her face contorts in a grimace, and the creature's lips stick together like melted wax.{/n}
